text: Mark van Heerden is one of the two guitarists for South African rock band Wickhead. He is known for his wild stage personality and his way of saying the wrong thing in interviews. Mark was born, and grew up, in Pietermaritzburg, South Africa. He now lives in California. == References == Category:South African guitarists Category:Male guitarists Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:People from Pietermaritzburg
title: Mark van Heerden
